definition: to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
surname Li

sentences.english: Inspiration is necessary to inculcate the sense of unity, and to create economic ideals.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸同心協力的認識，創造經濟理想也是需要靈感的。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該同心協力以援助遭水災的災民。

sentences.english: We must come together to end this war successfully.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須爲順利結束這場戰爭同心協力。

sentences.english: Let us work together to protect their innovation, and that of future generations.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們同心協力保護他們以及子孫後代的創新成果。

sentences.english: If we rally round, we can overcome our present troubles.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們同心協力，就能克服我們當前的困難。

sentences.english: Between them they can finish the job in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 他們同心協力，可以在幾天內完成這件工作。

sentences.english: The cox should organize and encourage all oar men to work together.
sentences.chinese: 舵手必須組織和鼓勵所有艇員同心協力進行比賽。

sentences.english: It has worked in concert with other observatories to provide a multihued view of the cosmos.
sentences.chinese: 它與其他天文臺同心協力，爲宇宙提供了彩色的視野。

sentences.english: The team must hang together in spite of their many losses.
sentences.chinese: 儘管失敗多次，這個隊一定要同心協力，抱成一團。

sentences.english: But the burdens of global citizenship continue to bind us together.
sentences.chinese: 但是作爲全球公民的責任仍促使我們同心協力。

sentences.english: All the organizations concerned with these areas of health must join forces.
sentences.chinese: 關注這些衛生領域的所有組織必須同心協力。

sentences.english: And now, we must come together to end this war successfully.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們必須爲順利結束這場戰爭同心協力。

sentences.english: But the main thing is that we work together. We all try to help each other.
sentences.chinese: 不過最主要的是我們同心協力，互幫互助。

sentences.english: FAO has united with the popular world of professional sport.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織與廣受歡迎的職業體育界同心協力。

sentences.english: Let us work together hand in hand, create the future.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們同心協力，攜手共進，開創未來。

sentences.english: After the earthquake, the whole country worked together on earthquake relief.
sentences.chinese: 地震發生後，全國上下同心協力，抗震救災。

definition: to be of one mind/to work as one
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
group mentality/collectivism/solidarity/team spirit
to yield to one another/mutual accommodation
fair competition
not to be shirked without dishonor (idiom)/incumbent/bounden (duty)
to meet a challenge
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to unite/unity/solidarity/united
social security (pensions, medical insurance)
to practice what one preaches (idiom)
to hope/to expect/expectation(s)
